mapper.select: select a_code as areaCode, name, alias_code as aliasCode from tb_area_code order by alias_code
SELECT c_code as churchCode, name, comment, pic, reg_id, reg_dt, upd_id, upd_dt FROM tb_church_code order by upd_dt desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_church_code (c_code, name, comment, pic, reg_id, reg_dt, upd_id, upd_dt) select concat(#{areaCode}, lpad(cast(substring(ifnull(max(c_code),'Z0000'), 2) as unsigned)+1, 4, '0')) as c_code , #{name}, #{comment}, #{pic}, #{userId}, now(), #{userId}, now() from tb_church_code where substring(c_code, 1, 1) = #{areaCode}
mapper.update: update tb_church_code set name=#{name}, comment=#{comment}, pic=#{pic}, upd_id=#{userId}, upd_dt=now() where c_code = #{churchCode}
mapper.select: SELECT a.p_code as pastorCode, a.c_code as churchCode, a.grade, a.name, a.comment, a.pic , b.name as churchName , a.reg_id as regId, a.reg_dt as regDt, a.upd_id as updId, a.upd_dt as updDt FROM tb_pastor a inner join tb_church_code b on a.c_code = b.c_code order by a.upd_dt desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_pastor (p_code, c_code, grade, name, comment, pic, reg_id, reg_dt, upd_id, upd_dt) select concat('P', lpad(cast(substring(ifnull(max(p_code), 'P000000'),2) as unsigned)+1, 6, '0')) as pastorCode , #{churchCode}, #{grade}, #{name}, #{comment}, #{pic}, #{userId}, now(), #{userId}, now() from tb_pastor
mapper.update: update tb_pastor set grade=#{grade}, name=#{name}, comment=#{comment}, pic=#{pic}, upd_id=#{userId}, upd_dt=now() where p_code = #{pastorCode}
